DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of these studies is to determine whether vestibular disorders could affect visuo-spatial cognition. Visuo-spatial cognition will be evaluated using a new questionnaire and a new computerized test using a digital tablet in different studies.
DOC.criteria: For participants of the questionnaire study : Participants with vertigo complaints versus participants without vertigo complaints. For patients of the behavioural study : Vestibular disorder (with or without vertigo) Deafness / hard of hearing Mental retardation (QI < 70 in verbal test) Neurological or psychiatric conditions Use of psychotropics drug 3 months before participation Cochlear Implant (for functional magnetic resonance imaging study)
